title: The Longest Night
description: He was the original cool operator. But now Jake Harrington needs Shannon McMahon's help to complete his deadly mission. Watching his target from her apartment, the military sniper isn't prepared for the emotions Shannon awakes in him, tempting him with her tenderness…and her innate sexiness.Shannon had come to far-off St. George to hide. She knows Jake is one of the good guys, but he won't let himself get close to anyone—until his cover is blown, sending them fleeing for their lives. Together on the run, desire flares, hot and unstoppable. Jake will surely rescue her from danger, but can she rescue his soul?
author: Cindy Dees
